sentence.Network_en: Plasmids are exta - chromosomal doublestranded, circular DNA molecules found in prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 质粒是在原核和真核细胞中发现的染色体外的双链环状DNA分子.

sentence.Network_en: All living cells can be classified as prokaryotic or eukaryotic.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有活细胞可以被划分为原核和真核两类.

sentence.Network_en: Magnetotactic bacteria ( MB ) belongs to Mycetozoan class with simple prokaryotic cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 趋磁细菌 ( MB ) 属变形菌纲,为简单的原核细胞.
